roleset.name: [put|be] in a line

role.descr: putter of something in a line

example.name: agent and lined up things merged
example.text: ``People are queuing at the door to take his product but he doesn't have the working capital to make the thing and commercial banks are very unsympathetic.

example.name: separated args
example.text: John queued his car at the car wash.

roleset.note: QUEUE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'queue' based on wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from queue.01-v)

roleset.name: line up, completive

example.name: arg1
example.text: Ma Ying - jeou has no privileges , he carries his ID card to queue up to vote along with ordinary people
example.arg: to vote along with ordinary people

roleset.note: QUEUE_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from queue.02-v)
